title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Message Execution Timeline
description: Provide timeline for a message being executed by the processing pipeline.

time-profiling.description: This datatype is used to store the time profiling information of any service or component.

xdm:componentName.title: serviceName
xdm:componentName.description: The name of the service/component, for which time information is captured.

xdm:serviceGroup.title: serviceGroup
xdm:serviceGroup.description: An optional attribute, to capture the timeline of a service, at sub-tree level.

xdm:startTime.title: startTime
xdm:startTime.description: Execution Start time in Epoch millis for the component.

xdm:endTime.title: endTime
xdm:endTime.description: Execution End time in Epoch millis for the component.

messageExecutionTimeline.title: messageExecutionTimeline
messageExecutionTimeline.description: An array of time-profiling for every component of execution pipeline.
